text:
Does anyone have any experience in creating templatized content — think checklists, audits, etc. — that people fill out and then share with other stakeholders in their company? For example, a compensation audit checklist that someone fills out and then it calculates (either manually, or through a tool) a score at the end with insights on action steps they could take to improve their compensation process. Or an interactive deck for making a business case for investing in your product, that a prospect could fill out and present to other executives, for example.

If so, could you share examples, and tools that you love using to build these types of content? Thanks!

elements.text:

For example, a compensation audit checklist that someone fills out and then it calculates (either manually, or through a tool) a score at the end with insights on action steps they could take to improve their compensation process. Or an interactive deck for making a business case for investing in your product, that a prospect could fill out and present to other executives, for example.

If so, could you share examples, and tools that you love using to build these types of content? Thanks!

text: Yeah I’ve done a lot of these using everything from Google slides to Outgrow. Here’s one example: <https://go1.predictiveindex.com/template/develop-vision-and-mission-statements|https://go1.predictiveindex.com/template/develop-vision-and-mission-statements>

attachments.fallback: How to develop vision and mission statements
attachments.text: Mission and vision statements drive your employees to execute on business strategy. Are yours inspiring that drive? Download our guide to crafting mission and vision statements that inspire.
attachments.title: How to develop vision and mission statements
